name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-oriented .NET Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions. Expertise in **.NET**, **AWS**, and **Azure DevOps** for building robust applications and implementing **REST APIs** to ensure seamless communication between systems. Proficient in **CI/CD** practices, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation and **automated testing** to maintain code quality and reliability. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills allow for the effective resolution of complex technical challenges.

Skilled in modern programming technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive hands-on experience across the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Extensive background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, along with a commitment to secure and maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Experienced in MLOps with a focus on real-world impact, adept in managing ML pipelines using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and optimized scalable .NET applications with adherence to architectural best practices and regulatory standards, utilizing **AWS** and **Azure DevOps** for CI/CD pipelines to ensure consistent delivery across environments.
•	Implemented REST APIs for seamless integration between frontend and backend services, focusing on scalability, security, and maintainability to support high-load applications.
•	Engineered CI/CD processes incorporating **Terraform**, significantly reducing deployment times by **30%** and enhancing operational efficiency.
•	Applied automated testing frameworks, improving code reliability and reducing bug counts by **40%** prior to releases through thorough integration and unit tests.
•	Contributed to problem-solving initiatives through collaborative efforts, facilitating discussions in English to effectively address technical challenges during project phases.
•	Led the migration of legacy systems to .NET Core (version **6.0**) enhancing performance and maintainability in financial applications.
•	Designed and developed microservices architecture using containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes, ensuring high availability and scalability for applications handling up to **1 million** daily transactions.
•	Integrated **AWS Lambda** functions, allowing real-time data processing and reducing latency by **25%** for financial transaction verification.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define system requirements and refine workflows, resulting in improved application functionalities and user experiences.
•	Mentored junior developers on best practices in .NET development and automated testing strategies, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.

Utilized **.NET** framework and **Azure DevOps** to implement CI/CD pipelines, ensuring efficient and automated deployment processes with a **95%** reduction in deployment times.
Developed and maintained robust **REST APIs** for financial applications, achieving a **99.9%** uptime by implementing comprehensive automated testing strategies.
Migrated legacy systems to **AWS** cloud services, resulting in enhanced scalability and a reduction in operational costs by **20%**.
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to identify and solve complex problems in application development, enhancing overall system performance and reliability.
Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the team.
Conducted performance tuning and monitoring of applications using profiling tools, enabling proactive identification of bottlenecks and system enhancements.
Documented architectural decisions and best practices for future reference, promoting maintainability and coherence across projects.

Developed and maintained REST APIs utilizing **.NET** frameworks to support seamless integration of backend services within the application ecosystem, ensuring high standards for scalability and performance.
Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps** and **Terraform** to automate deployment processes, reducing deployment time by **30%** and minimizing manual errors.
Participated in automated testing strategies, enhancing code reliability and lowering regression defects by **25%**, while maintaining a strong focus on quality assurance.
Leveraged **AWS** cloud services to optimize application hosting and data storage, achieving cost-efficient scaling for high-traffic environments, and establishing a resilient infrastructure.
Employed problem-solving techniques to troubleshoot and resolve complex software issues, enhancing overall functionality and user experience on critical projects.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using English for effective communication of technical concepts, project updates, and troubleshooting strategies, contributing to smoother project workflows.
Utilized Agile methodologies in project management, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint retrospectives to continuously improve development processes and team collaboration.
